name: http-status-codes-search
title: HTTP status codes
description: Find the right HTTP status code with ease. All status code information is available locally. You only need the internet if you want to search directly on [nozilla.org](https://developer.mozilla.org). All codes are linked to mozilla.org for convenience.
author: bitSchleuder

commands.title: Find HTTP status code
